title: Democracy Now! 2022-11-04 Friday
description:
Benjamin Netanyahu is set to return as prime minister in Israel, this time with help from a far-right politician who supports ethnic cleansing of Palestinians; Asylum seekers arrive in New York from southern border states, where many say they faced pressure to relocate; The Department of Homeland Security’s expanding efforts to monitor and shape online speech.

Democracy Now! 2022-11-04 Friday

  • Headlines for November 04, 2022
  • From Terrorist Backer to Kingmaker: Itamar Ben-Gvir & Israeli Far Right Help Netanyahu Regain Power
  • Meet the New Yorkers Welcoming Asylum Seekers Bused to City After Hostile Reception at U.S. Border
